titles.title: Recognizing the impact of Sister Cities International and expressing support for the designation of July 15, 2016, as "Sister Cities International Day".
Recognizing the impact of Sister Cities International and expressing support for the designation of July 15, 2016, as "Sister Cities International Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the lasting positive impact of Sister Cities International.
Supports the designation of Sister Cities International Day.
